item.title: 3 things I would like to be
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: If you’ve been following me through the past time, you probably know I want to go further in technology field (if you didn’t know, read my about page). But it is not the unique thing I would like to be because there are 3 things I would like to be. When we choose to be something or to follow some field of study, we should think a lot about it to find out if we are sure we want to follow it.
